name: Pedro Matiello
tagline: Bachelor of Computer Science — Instituto de Matemática e Estatística, Universidade de São Paulo. Currently living in São Paulo, Brazil, and working for Baby.com.br as software developer.
body:
## Pedro Matiello

[Email](mailto:pedro@pmatiello.me) | [Blog](http://pmatiello.blogspot.com.br) | [Twitter](http://twitter.com/pmatiello) | [LinkedIn](http://www.linkedin.com/in/pmatiello)

## Projects

**[python-graph](http://code.google.com/p/python-graph/)**
  - A library for working with graphs in Python.

**[pistache](http://code.google.com/p/pistache/)**
  - A π-Calculus internal DSL for Scala (This is my Course Final Project).

**More on my [GitHub profile](http://www.github.com/pmatiello).**


### Talks

**[Lazy Evaluation em Scala](https://speakerdeck.com/pmatiello/lazy-evaluation-em-scala)**
  - The Developer's Conference 2012, July/2012.

**[Por que dizemos que Scala é uma linguagem funcional?](https://speakerdeck.com/pmatiello/por-que-dizemos-que-scala-e-uma-linguagem-funcional)**
  - VII Scaladores (São Paulo Scala User Group), June/2012.

**[Scala Streams](https://gist.github.com/pmatiello/1449901)** 
  - II Scaladores (São Paulo Scala User Group), December/2011.

**[Pistache: A π-Calculus Internal Domain Specific Language for Scala](https://speakerdeck.com/pmatiello/pistache-a-p-calculus-internal-domain-specific-language-for-scala)**
  - XIV Simpósio Brasileiro de Métodos Formais (SBMF 2011), September/2011.

**[VRaptor for the Google App Engine](https://github.com/caelum/palestra-gae)**
  - São Paulo's Google Technology User Group meeting, September/2010.
